poem:
Title: Upon Parchment and Runways

In satchels of satin, the courage is sewn,
Designer's decree whispers sustainability's tone.
A catwalk's chorus, jaded, unknown,
Now digital trends in palm-held cell phone.

Stuart's hands graft echoes shaky but true,
Reviving Coach's American hue.
And what of fashion weeks, in time's hallowed hall?
Only sustain, for the canvas is all.
